  physical_appearance: This is a red and gold silk songket. It is rectangular in shape. The panels at either end are decorated with scrolling triangular bamboo motifs and tulip motifs. The central panel is decorated with floral motifs
 star motifs
 and floral chains. There are no tears seen on the fabric.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a red and gold silk songket. It is rectangular in shape. The panels at either end are decorated with scrolling triangular bamboo motifs and tulip motifs. The central panel is decorated with floral motifs, star motifs, and floral chains. There are no tears seen on the fabric.
